ComicInfo.Summary: Chapter X Benediction (Part Four of a Three Part Series!): Loki claims to be Deadpool's father and, in order to save Death from dear old dad, Deadpool has to take on Uncle Thor. With Asgardian blood now flowing in his veins, Deadpool steals Thor's hammer and becomes the Mighty Deadpool. While Jake runs around trying to get his secret identity back, Deadpool abuses his newfound heroic powers. But, hey, Loki is the god of lies and things turn out to be a little illusionary. Jake regains the power of Thor and beats Deadpool down. With the conflict resolved, Wade returns home and finds that his hideous face has been fixed and he is now handsome.
ComicInfo.Title: Chapter X Benediction (Part Four of a Three Part Series!)
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
